item.description:
The folks at the Beachcomber have been gracious enough to let us have a portion of the place for a little Single Mingle. This place is very informal with cheap drinks and a fun atmosphere. It's a perfect venue for those who want to have a coupla cheap cocktails, talk and dance the night away.

Cash bar with generous portions and cheap drinks ..... Food and entertainment will be provided with cover.

So bring all of your single friends and even your not so single friends for a night of fun and frolic on the lovely Quincy shore - aka The Irish Riviera !!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for John or Roger - we will have the area in the door to the left

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Valentines Schmalentines - Love's Misfits have a night out !
